titles.title: Support Working Parents Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the phasedown of the credit percentage for the dependent care tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/30/2015--Introduced. Support Working Parents Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the phaseout of the tax credit for dependent care services for taxpayers whose adjusted gross incomes exceed $15,000.
